name: Basic Math 4 Kids
description:
A game made by Anagh's World for 3 different Jams

Please Note: This game can also be played on a Mobile/Tab and is very light-weight (~ 48K).

Overview

  • A basic math game for kids (3-10 years).
  • Covers - Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and Division.
  • Each level consists of 9 questions (from any category you choose at runtime).
  • To win you need to answer at least 5 out of the 9 questions.

Jams & Themes

  • Weekly Game Jam - Week 265
    • The math equations that auto generate are programmed. 
  • Novice Summer Jam Series: One-Button Input Jam
    • To play the game you need to click only one-button at a time.
  • Playtesting Jam #1
    • The game is playable and free.

Credits

  • Concept, Design & Programming
    • Anagh's World - using plain HTML, CSS and JavaScript
